TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit VoiceLiveSession extends System.Object implements class System.IAsyncDisposable, class System.IDisposable
Public Class VoiceLiveSession Implements IAsyncDisposable, IDisposable
type VoiceLiveSession = class interface IDisposable interface IAsyncDisposable

Docs.summary: Represents a WebSocket-based session for real-time voice communication with the Azure VoiceLive service.
Docs.remarks: This class abstracts bidirectional communication between the caller and service, simultaneously sending and receiving WebSocket messages.

member this.GetUpdates : System.Threading.CancellationToken -> seq<Azure.AI.VoiceLive.SessionUpdate>

Docs.summary: Gets all server events from the VoiceLive service synchronously.
Docs.returns: An enumerable of VoiceLive server events.
Docs.remarks: This method provides synchronous access to all server events from the service. For better performance and resource utilization, consider using instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.Generic.IAsyncEnumerable<Azure.AI.VoiceLive.SessionUpdate> GetUpdatesAsync (System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IAsyncEnumerable`1<class Azure.AI.VoiceLive.SessionUpdate> GetUpdatesAsync(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
Public Function GetUpdatesAsync (Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As IAsyncEnumerable(Of SessionUpdate)
member this.GetUpdatesAsync : System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Collections.Generic.IAsyncEnumerable<Azure.AI.VoiceLive.SessionUpdate>

Docs.summary: Gets all server events from the VoiceLive service as an asynchronous enumerable.
Docs.returns: An asynchronous enumerable of VoiceLive server events.
Docs.remarks:
This method provides streaming access to all server events from the service, including session events, input audio processing events, response streaming, and error notifications.
The method handles WebSocket message fragmentation automatically and ensures that complete messages are processed before yielding events.
